title: How Many Calories Are in 4 Strawberries?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in 4 strawberries, including carbs, fiber, sugars, protein, fat, and quick tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories Are in 4 Strawberries?
assumptions: Medium-sized fresh strawberries (~12 g each), raw, whole, no added sugar or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, ripeness, variety, and growing conditions. Check labels for packaged berries when available.

quick_answer.text: Four medium strawberries offer about 16 kcal and 1 g fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one strawberry?
faqs.a: About 4 kcal for a medium fresh strawberry.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in 4 strawberries?
faqs.a: Roughly 3.6 g total carbs, including 0.8 g fiber and 2.4 g sugars.

faqs.q: Do strawberries have protein or fat?
faqs.a: Very low: 0.4 g protein and 0.2 g fat for 4 medium strawberries.

faqs.q: How does strawberry size affect calories?
faqs.a: Larger ones (~18 g) have ~6 kcal each; smaller (~8 g) ~3 kcal. Adjust based on weight.

faqs.q: Are frozen strawberries higher in calories?
faqs.a: No significant difference if unsweetened; added sugar increases calories.
